page.title: 09THE CLINTON ESTATE
page.content:
{The Clinton Estate}exerts a big influence on the life of{Merton}and{ {Huish},not only in terms of land and house use and ownership,but also in the location,name and badge of {The {Clinton School}.
{The Clinton Estate}also provides employment in domestic service and woodland manegement,as well as for a gamekeeper,masons and carpenters, and for employees of{The Victoria Sawmills and on {The Home Farm}.
{The Victoria Sawmills}employs six people in the production of farm fencing materials.
There are nine employees working on{The Home Farm}to produce beef,sheep and cereals.This enterprise was begun in the early 19th.century.
